channel.title: CVE Feed for Martin Gibson -- WP GoToWebinar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Martin Gibson -- WP GoToWebinar

item.title: CVE-2024-38671|2024-08-02T04:12:25.950Z -- martin%20gibson -- wp%20gotowebinar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Martin Gibson WP GoToWebinar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP GoToWebinar: from n/a through 15.7.
